::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tmap, SpatialAcc, sf, 
               ggstatsplot, reshape2,
               tidyverse)
```
:::


# 2. Importing Data

## 2.1 Geospatial Data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_NO_SEA_PL") %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 3414)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'

Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagons <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                    layer = "hexagons") %>%

```

## 2.2 OD Matrix

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ODMatrix <- read_csv("data/aspatial/OD_Matrix.csv", 
                     skip = 0)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 375000 Columns: 6
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
dbl (6): origin_id, destination_id, entry_cost, network_cost, exit_cost, tot...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# entry = the entry point
# network = distance from the start to the end
# exit = the exit point
```
:::



# 3. Data Cleaning and Updating Attributes

## 3.1 Supply


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
eldercare <- eldercare %>%
  select(fid, ADDRESSPOS) %>%
  mutate(capacity = 100)
```
:::


## 3.2 Demand


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagons <- hexagons %>%
  select(fid) %>%
  mutate(demand = 100)
```
:::


## 3.3 OD Matrix


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distmat <- ODMatrix %>%
  select(origin_id, destination_id, total_cost) %>%
  spread(destination_id, total_cost)%>%
  select(c(-c('origin_id')))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distmat_km <- as.matrix(distmat/1000)
```
:::


# 4. Computing Handsen's Accessibility

## 4.1 The base code


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acc_Hansen <- data.frame(ac(hexagons$demand,
                            eldercare$capacity,
                            distmat_km, 
                            #d0 = 50, set to constraints
                            power = 2, 
                            family = "Hansen"))
```
:::


## 4.2 Tidy the output

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(acc_Hansen) <- "accHansen"

# acc_Hansen <- tbl_df(acc_Hansen)
acc_Hansen <- tibble::as_tibble(acc_Hansen)

hexagon_Hansen <- bind_cols(hexagons, acc_Hansen)
```
:::


## 4.3 Combine code chunk

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acc_Hansen <- data.frame(ac(hexagons$demand,
                            eldercare$capacity,
                            distmat_km, 
                            #d0 = 50,
                            power = 0.5, 
                            family = "Hansen"))

colnames(acc_Hansen) <- "accHansen"
# acc_Hansen <- tbl_df(acc_Hansen)
acc_Hansen <- tibble::as_tibble(acc_Hansen)

hexagon_Hansen <- bind_cols(hexagons, acc_Hansen)
```
:::


# 5. Visualising Accessibility


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mapex <- st_bbox(hexagons)

tmap_mode("plot")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
tmap mode set to plotting
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(hexagon_Hansen,
         bbox = mapex) + 
  tm_fill(col = "accHansen",
          n = 10,
          style = "quantile",
          border.col = "black",
          border.lwd = 1) +
tm_shape(eldercare) +
  tm_symbols(size = 0.1) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Accessibility to eldercare: Hansen method",
            main.title.position = "center",
            main.title.size = 2,
            legend.outside = FALSE,
            legend.height = 0.45, 
            legend.width = 3.0,
            legend.format = list(digits = 6),
            legend.position = c("right", "top"),
            frame = TRUE) +
  tm_compass(type="8star", size = 2) +
  tm_scale_bar(width = 0.15) +
  tm_grid(lwd = 0.1, alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagon_Hansen <- st_join(hexagon_Hansen, mpsz, 
                          join = st_intersects)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggbetweenstats(
  data = hexagon_Hansen,
  x = REGION_N,
  y = accHansen,
  type = "p")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
